backend/lib/Notification.mo: Defines notification types and the Notification record structure including metadata and read status.
backend/lib/Statistics.mo: Defines types for monthly report stats, phone status breakdown, and overall system statistics.
backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining phone, user, report, PIN, invite, ownership, and notification storage plus related operations and access control.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of all frontend source files and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component handling authentication, access checks, profile gating, splash screen, and layout selection.
frontend/src/components/ActivationPendin: UI screen shown to unactivated users with instructions, principal copy button, and logout.
frontend/src/components/ImeiHistoryTimel: Timeline component rendering IMEI event history with icons, labels, badges, and loading skeleton.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Provides a dropdown button to switch between Indonesian and English using i18next.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Defines the app’s main layout with header, routed content, and bottom navigation tabs, including dynamic admin and notification badges.
frontend/src/components/NotificationPopu: Displays a timed popup card for notifications with type-based styling and a close button.
frontend/src/components/PinSettingsDialo: Renders a dialog for setting or changing a 4‑digit security PIN with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a profile setup form for name, email, and city, submitting data via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating related queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for accessing and mutating user, access, and admin-related backend data using the actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Implements a lightweight i18n system with language storage, translation retrieval, and subscription-based updates.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: English translation resource file containing UI strings for the app.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/id.json: Indonesian translation resource file containing UI strings for the app.
frontend/src/i18n/useTranslation.ts: React hook that exposes translation functions and listens for i18n language changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with translated content explaining the app’s purpose and blockchain benefits using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInviteManagement: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserActivationPa: Provides a UI for admins to validate and activate users by Principal ID using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CheckImeiPage.tsx: Allows users to check an IMEI’s status and view history, showing result cards based on backend status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays statistics and recent theft reports with loading states and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows a login screen with language switcher, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/MyPhonesPage.tsx: Manages user's phone list with dialogs for adding and releasing phones, including PIN checks and activation validation.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications with filtering, icons, timestamp formatting, and options to mark items as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile data, account status, PIN settings, and provides logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ReportFoundPage.tsx: Form for reporting a found phone by submitting its IMEI and optional contact info.
frontend/src/pages/ReportLostPage.tsx: Allows users to report a registered phone as lost or stolen, including location capture and details.
frontend/src/pages/StatisticsPage.tsx: React page that fetches statistics, showing skeleton loaders, error alerts, and charts for summary and trend data.
frontend/src/utils/releaseOwnershipError: Utility that converts various backend or thrown errors into safe, user-friendly messages for phone ownership release failures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing invitation-token activation flow, issues, and pending feature requests for fixing token reuse and user activation handling.
